Package de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.utilities.scaling

Scaling functions: linear, logarithmic, gamma, clipping, ...

See:
          Description


Interface Summary
ScalingFunction Interface for scaling functions used e.g. by outlier evaluation such as Histograms and visualization.
StaticScalingFunction Interface for Scaling functions that do NOT depend on analyzing the data set.
 

Class Summary
ClipScaling Scale implementing a simple clipping.
ClipScaling.Parameterizer Parameterization class.
GammaScaling Non-linear scaling function using a Gamma curve.
GammaScaling.Parameterizer Parameterization class.
IdentityScaling The trivial "identity" scaling function.
LinearScaling Simple linear scaling function.
MinusLogScaling Scaling function to invert values by computing -1 * Math.log(x)
 

Package de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.utilities.scaling Description

Scaling functions: linear, logarithmic, gamma, clipping, ...
